#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This application is developed in Qt 4.6.3 under Kubuntu 10.04. So you need install "libqt4-dev".




= Details =

Steps: 
   * sudo apt-get install libqt4-dev 
   * cd /QartRockbox/ 
   * qmake make 
   * ./QartRockbox
